title: Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1948
medium:
Medium: cotton, glass beads, sequins
Technique: appliqué and embroidery on net
description: Panel of brilliant red net appliquéd and embroidered in a design of a rose stem with leaves. Rose spray in machine imitation of chain stitch with red sequins, green glass beads, and a large red glass bead at center. Outlined with ruffles of net.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1948. Medium: cotton, glass beads, sequins
Technique: appliqué and embroidery on net. 
1948-37-1
